quest.name: A Golden Opportunity
journal:
Kipih Jakkya needs help penning her next hit article.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Kipih Jakkya informs you that her publication, The Raven, has been invited to write an article to promote the exciting event underway at the Gold Saucer. She seeks another perspective to add a bit of spice to her report, and she requests the insight of an adventurer─namely, you. She asks that you meet her at the entrance to the Gold Saucer, where a member of the staff awaits to greet you.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

You arrive at the Gold Saucer to see that two other reporters have been invited, and the attendant Ollier explains that he wishes for each to write a piece espousing the locale's charm to their respective audiences. He then reveals that a mammet hunt has been arranged for the guests, and that the reporter to find the most wind-up Godberts will be granted an exclusive interview with the Gold Saucer's owner. To even the odds, the other two reporters team up, and quickly set off into the din of their surroundings. Eager to win this once-in-a-career opportunity, Kipih Jakkya wishes to discuss strategy sooner rather than later.

Kipih Jakkya suggests a divide and conquer strategy, with each of you searching two sections of the massive casino for the mammets. You are tasked with searching Wonder Square and Round Square for any sign of the miniature Mandervilles.

After a thorough search, you manage to find both mammets before your opponents. Kipih managed to find one herself, and with your victory now assured, she instructs you to meet her back at the entrance so you can report to Ollier.

You and Kipih present the three mammets to Ollier, and he declares you the winners of the exclusive interview with Godbert Manderville. The attendant stands ready to call upon the elusive goldsmith, and while Kipih Jakkya seems eager to avail herself of her prize, the sounds of clinking coins and revelry call to you from deeper within the Gold Saucer.
objectives: Speak with Kipih Jakkya at the Gold Saucer.
Deliver the wind-up Godberts to Ollier.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: As I live and breathe─is that Forename!? What a pleasant surprise!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You're that reporter, right? Kip... Uh...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Have we met before?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Is your brother Nhagi well?

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Yes, yes, Kipih Jakkya, at your service. Or rather, at The Raven's service, I suppose. I never had the chance to thank you properly for before─the article I wrote with your help drew eyes from across the realm and beyond to our tabloid.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Don't tell me you've forgotten who I am? It's me, Kipih Jakkya, reporter─and dare I say wordsmith─for The Raven. Did you even read the article you helped me write? Too busy adventuring, I suppose.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: It was the highlight of my already illustrious career, and I'm overjoyed to see you again. Actually, I'm in need of help to write my latest piece, and since fortune has placed you before me, I wonder if you wouldn't lend me a hand.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: How do you know my brother? I don't recall telling you his name... Now that you mention it, he did recently send me a letter...

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Ah, but this is no time to be speaking of such things. I'm in need of help to write my latest piece, and since fortune has placed you before me, I wonder if you wouldn't lend me a hand.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: You there, you have the look of the adventuring sort. I've been looking for someone like you to help me with my new piece.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: This is your golden opportunity to be immortalized within the pages of The Raven, Eorzea's preeminent tabloid. Rest assured that unlike reporters for more unsavory rags, I, Kipih Jakkya, credit all who contribute to my articles.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: What do you say? I promise that at the very least, you'll leave this experience more enriched and with an appreciation for the finer aspects of journalism.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Your contribution shall be much appreciated, I'm sure. Now then, the matter at hand is this invitation, which was sent to The Raven offices from the Gold Saucer.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: We have been asked to write a piece on the festivities currently underway at the establishment. Naturally, as The Raven's most senior reporter, I was chosen for this privileged task.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I carry the reputation of my publication on my shoulders, and there's no shame in recruiting an assistant or two with whom to share the weight. I need someone with keen skills of observation and a dazzling insight.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Judging by our previous adventures, there is none more suited for this task than you, dear Forename! So, how about it? Can I count on you?

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: And judging by my previous experiences with adventurers, you should be well equipped for this task! So, how about it? Can I count on you?

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Very good! Well then, let's depart to the Gold Saucer at once. The invitation states that a member of the staff awaits our arrival at Entrance Square.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: If you've never visited the Gold Saucer, go and speak with that young man over there. Earlier he was handing out free tickets with abandon, and you'll need one lest our journey be short-lived indeed.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the quest “It Could Happen to You,” which can be undertaken at level 15.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Yes... It seems all the invited reporters have arrived... Understood, I shall proceed as planned...

dialogue.name: DURALTHARAL
dialogue.text: If only we at the Mythril Eye could deliver an exclusive interview to our readers...

dialogue.name: PETYRWINSOME
dialogue.text: Here we are in Ul'dah's premier center of leisure and entertainment. The readers of the Harbor Herald will be eager for an inside look at the revels which take place in these gleaming halls.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: There you are, adventurer! Let's not keep our host waiting.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Ah, you must be from The Raven. Allow me to welcome you personally to the Gold Saucer.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Oh, I did not expect to see you there, MistressMaster Surname! You are always welcome as our honored guest.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: An honored guest, is it? It seems I picked the right adventurer for the job.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: MistressMaster Surname is helping you? Well, I must say, this gives The Raven a significant advantage.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: With your arrival, all of our guests are present. Now, if I could have but a moment of your time...

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Illustrious reporters of Eorzea, I welcome you one and all to the Gold Saucer. My name is Ollier, and I have the distinct pleasure of serving as an attendant here.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: As you are well aware, we are currently holding our most fabulous event of the year─the Make It Rain Campaign.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: During its duration, guests may receive up to fifty percent more MGP, a currency which can be exchanged within these gilded walls for a bevy of fantastic goods. People of all stripes pour into the Gold Saucer during this event, eager to take their piece of the generous bounty we offer.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: However, some in Eorzea have yet to grace us with their patronage, which is why we have invited the most esteemed reporters in the realm to partake in our festivities...and prepared sizable compensation for your resulting articles.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Of course, a simple tour would hardly suffice to satisfy such curious minds as yours. So we have taken the liberty of preparing a little diversion for the occasion.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Behold this masterful mammet, made in the precise likeness of Godbert Manderville. We have hidden four throughout the Gold Saucer─one in each section, excluding Chocobo Square.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Use your keen reporter's sense to seek them out. And to the one who finds the most mammets...

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: We shall reward an exclusive interview with the man himself, President Godbert Manderville of Manderville & Manderville, famed goldsmith and proprietor of dreams!

dialogue.name: DURALTHARAL
dialogue.text: No paper has ever succeeded in securing a personal interview with Godbert Manderville! Can you believe our luck!?

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: He's right─an interview with Godbert Manderville would draw more eyes to The Raven than news of another Calamity! This isn't a competition to be taken lightly!

dialogue.name: PETYRWINSOME
dialogue.text: Hmm... The reward is worthwhile, to be sure, but both Master Tharal and I have come here alone, while The Raven seems to have sent two reporters.

dialogue.name: PETYRWINSOME
dialogue.text: I propose that the Harbor Herald and the Mythril Eye join forces. That would even the odds enough, methinks.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I've no objection to that. To the winners go Manderville's secrets─to the losers, pitiful ignorance. Let's keep our eyes well peeled, adventurer!

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Then let us make an addendum to the rules─in the case both teams find the same number of mammets, the swiftest to return will be judged the victor.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Now, let the mammet hunt begin! Search every corner of our establishment, and may you find the bounties you seek.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: If there are four wind-up Godberts hidden out there, we should each search for two.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: You take Wonder Square and Round Square, and I'll cover the remaining two sections. An equal division of labor!

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: If anything happens, we can stay in touch via this linkpearl. Now, let's find those mammets and win that interview!

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Which team of reporters will prove to have the keenest eyes and sharpest senses? I look forward to finding out.

dialogue.name: PETYRWINSOME
dialogue.text: Since the mammet hidden in Entrance Square cannot be seen from the threshold, it can only be in Card Square. Heh heh, the interview is as good as mine.

dialogue.name: DURALTHARAL
dialogue.text: Godbert, Godbert, where is the Godbert? Hmm... Nowhere, it seems.

dialogue.name: PETYRWINSOME
dialogue.text: Where could one hide in such an open space? If I were a mammet...

dialogue.name: DURALTHARAL
dialogue.text: Godbert, oh Godbeeert... Ugh, where are you?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You found a wind-up Godbert!

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: (-Kipih Jakkya-)Bad news, adventurer. It seems I wasn't quick enough to find the mammet in Entrance Square. Please tell me you're faring better than I.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: (-Kipih Jakkya-)You found one!? Thank goodness! We're still in the running. I'll make haste to Event Square─godsspeed in finding your final mammet!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You found a wind-up Godbert!

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: (-Kipih Jakkya-)Adventurer, good news this time! I found the mammet in Event Square!

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: (-Kipih Jakkya-)You found yours, too? Then it's settled! That interview is mine─oh, is ours, of course.

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: (-Kipih Jakkya-)We must report our victory to Ollier at once. See you at Entrance Square!

dialogue.name: KIPIHJAKKYA
dialogue.text: There you are! Quite impressive work, I must say. To think we would trounce the opposition so convincingly─all thanks to your eagle eyes!

dialogue.name: PETYRWINSOME
dialogue.text: Just a moment after I spied the mammet, I spied the reporter from The Raven picking it up. Oh, if only I didn't stop for refreshments...

dialogue.name: DURALTHARAL
dialogue.text: It seems I was no match for you, adventurer. You found both mammets before I even had a chance to take the lay of the land. I know who to call upon next time I need to search for treasure.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Welcome back. Mistress Jakkya has informed me that you were able to find two mammets?

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Indeed! Exactly two likenesses. The final results are as follows─three mammets found by the reporters of The Raven and one mammet by the reporters of the Mythril Eye and the Harbor Herald.

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Which means that The Raven shall be rewarded with an exclusive interview with Lord Manderville! Congratulations to you both!

dialogue.name: OLLIER
dialogue.text: Once you have sufficiently prepared yourselves, simply speak to me and I shall summon him forthwith.
